title: Screenshots in App Store / Google Play
custom_steps: WHEN user views the App Store / Google Play
custom_expected: THEN user is displayed with new screenshots of the app with updated features

title: Reward Pack Loyalty Bonus
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has an account with MLB

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user opens the app for the first time in the current season
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user receives a reward pack
AND all returning users should receive a reward pack

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the reward pack
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the title should be  'Welcome Back Bonus!'

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the rewards pack in the feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the feed Event Copy should be 'You unlocked a Welcome Back Bonus Reward Pack!'

title: Reward Pack Welcome Bonus
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is a NEW user

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user creates an account and opens the app
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user receives a reward pack
AND all new users should receive a reward pack

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the reward pack
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the title should be  'Welcome Bonus!'

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the rewards pack in the feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the feed Event Copy should be 'You unlocked a Welcome Bonus Reward Pack!'

title: Forced Update Modal
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has an account with MLB

custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with modal
AND modal is full-screen with no ability to dismiss live after new version is released on app store

THEN user sees: 
Title: Update MLB Play
Copy: We’ve added new games and new features for the 2023 MLB season. You’ll need the latest and greatest version of MLB Play to join the fun. Download and install the update now.
Link to Google Play listing

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the link
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is brought to Apple Store / Google Play
